actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exclude from gross income $200 of interest in the case of an individual taxpayer.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from gross income up to $200 of the interest income received by a taxpayer for a taxable year.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exclude from gross income $200 of interest in the case of an individual taxpayer.
